    Contact

    Location

    The Rasmussen lab is located on the beautiful University of Washington campus in Seattle. The lab is on the third floor of the new Life Sciences Building.

    The lab shares space with the Cabernard, Paredez, Parrish and Wakimoto labs, making for an interactive and collegial environment!
